name: Capone"Gang"Bege
text: On Play: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Firetank Pirates) or (Straw Hat Crew) type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Firetank Pirates) or (Straw Hat Crew) type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
